opticomlib.typing.eye

class opticomlib.typing.eye(eye_dict={})[source]

Eye diagram parameters object.

t

the time values resampled. Shape (Nx1).

Type:

ndarray

y

the signal values resampled. Shape (Nx1).

Type:

ndarray

dt

time between samples.

Type:

float

sps

samples per slot.

Type:

int

t_left

cross time of left edge.

Type:

float

t_right

cross time of right edge.

Type:

float

t_opt

optimal time decision.

Type:

float

t_dist

time between slots.

Type:

float

t_span0

t_opt - t_dist*5%.

Type:

float

t_span1

t_opt + t_dist*5%.

Type:

float

y_top

samples of signal above threshold and within t_span0 and t_apan1.

Type:

ndarray

y_bot

samples of signal below threshold and within t_span0 and t_apan1.

Type:

ndarray

mu0

mean of y_bot.

Type:

float

mu1

mean of y_top.

Type:

float

s0

standard deviation of y_bot.

Type:

float

s1

standard deviation of y_top.

Type:

float

er

extinsion ratio.

Type:

float

eye_h

eye height.

Type:

float

__init__(eye_dict={})[source]

Methods

__init__([eye_dict])

plot(umbral[, medias_, legend_, show_, ...])

Plot eye diagram.

print([msg])

Print object parameters.

print_([msg])

Print object parameters as (key: value).
